title: Switch Islamic reminders experience mode to manual reading
description: Verify that admins can switch the Islamic reminders dashboard to manual reading mode and that the UI updates accordingly and persists the mode and related sources in the database.

steps.description: Navigate to the Islamic reminders dashboard as an admin
Click the button to set experience mode to manual reading
Check that the UI state updates to manual reading mode (adhkar and hadith content display manually)
Verify that the mode state (manual reading) and sources (morning, evening, hadith) are persisted in the database

title: Switch Islamic reminders experience mode to visual media mode
description: Verify that admins can switch the Islamic reminders dashboard to visual media mode and that the UI updates accordingly and persists the mode and sources in the database.

steps.description: Navigate to the Islamic reminders dashboard as an admin
Click the button to set experience mode to visual media
Check that the UI state updates to visual media mode (adhkar and hadith content display visually)
Verify that the mode state (visual media) and sources (morning, evening, hadith) are persisted in the database

title: Retain Islamic reminders experience mode after page reload
description: Ensure that after switching experience modes, refreshing the Islamic reminders dashboard retains the selected mode and displays the correct content accordingly.

steps.description: Set experience mode to manual reading on the Islamic reminders dashboard
Reload or re-enter the Islamic reminders dashboard page
Confirm the mode is still manual reading and the UI content matches this mode
Set experience mode to visual media
Reload or re-enter the dashboard
Confirm the mode is still visual media and the UI content matches this mode

title: User dashboard mobile sidebar becomes fixed off-canvas panel
description: Verify that on small screen widths, the user dashboard sidebar displays as a fixed off-canvas panel.

steps.description: Resize browser window or simulate a mobile device screen width
Navigate to the user dashboard
Check that the sidebar is hidden initially and can be toggled as a fixed off-canvas panel
Ensure the main content remains scrollable with adjusted padding to accommodate sidebar behavior

title: Floating sidebar toggle button disabled in mobile view
description: Verify that the floating sidebar toggle button is disabled or hidden in mobile view to prevent overlay issues.

steps.description: Simulate a mobile device or small screen size
Navigate to the user dashboard
Confirm the floating sidebar toggle button is disabled, hidden, or non-interactive

title: User dashboard sidebar toggles on mobile correctly
description: Verify that the off-canvas sidebar opens and closes correctly via user interaction on mobile view without blocking main content scrolling.

steps.description: Simulate a small screen device and open the user dashboard
Use the sidebar toggle mechanism available on mobile (excluding floating button) to open the sidebar
Check that the sidebar appears as a fixed off-canvas panel
Scroll the main content area
Ensure main content remains scrollable and the sidebar does not overlay or block scrolling
Close the sidebar using the available close controls
Verify the sidebar disappears correctly
